tit.j: 関西文化学術研究都市

sen.j: 関西文化学術研究都市（かんさいぶんかがくじゅつけんきゅうとし）（以下、本稿では「学研都市」と表記する）は、創造的な学術・研究の振興、新産業・新文化の創造や発信などを目的として建設されている都市である。
sen.e: Kansai Science City (to be referred to as Science city in the following) was constructed for promoting creative academic and reasearch activities and for creating/dispatching new industries and new culture.

Kansai Science City (to be referred to as Science city in the following) was constructed to promote creative academic and reasearch activities as well as creating/dispatching of new industries and culture.

Kansai Science City (to be referred to as Science city in the following) was constructed to promote creative academic and research activities as well as creating/dispatching of new industries and culture.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 大阪府、京都府、奈良県にまたがる京阪奈丘陵に位置し、新産業・新文化などの発信の拠点・中心となることを目指している。
sen.e: Located on the Keihanna hill across the borders of Osaka Prefecture, Kyoto Prefecture and Nara Prefecture, the city aims at becoming the site and center of dispatching new industries and new culture.
Located on the Keihanna hill across the borders of Osaka Prefecture, Kyoto Prefecture and Nara Prefecture, the city aims at becoming the the center of new industries and culture.
Located on the Keihanna hill across the borders of Osaka Prefecture, Kyoto Prefecture and Nara Prefecture, the city aims at becoming the center of new industries and culture.
sen.cmt: ダブりを削除しました。

sen.j: 学研都市とも呼ばれ、愛称はけいはんな学研都市とされている。
sen.e: It is also called "Sience City" and is nicknamed "Keihanna Science City."
It is also called "Science City" and is nicknamed "Keihanna Science City."
It is also called "Science City" and is nicknamed "Keihanna Science City."

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に変更しました。

sen.j: 建設の契機は奥田東・京都大学名誉教授による提案による「関西学術研究都市調査懇談会」（通称・奥田懇談会）の提言によるものが大きかった。
sen.e: It was a proposal by "Kansai Science City Surveillance Conversazione" generated based on a proposal by Higashi OKUDA, professor emeritus of Kyoto University, (so-called Okuda Conversazione) that became the big turning point for constructing this city.

The construction of the city was largely grounded in a proposal, "Kansai Science City Surveillance Conversazione," by Higashi OKUDA, professor emeritus of Kyoto University, (so-called Okuda Conversazione).

The construction of the city was largely grounded in a proposal, "Kansai Science City Surveillance Conversazione," by Azuma OKUDA, professor emeritus of Kyoto University, (so-called Okuda Conversazione).

sen.j: 彼は提案の理由を、「ローマクラブの研究報告『成長の限界―ローマ・クラブ人類の危機レポート』を読み、その内容に深い衝撃を受けたためだ。」と語った。
sen.e: "He read 'The Limits to Growth; A Report for the Club of Rome's Project on the Predicament of Mankind', a research report by Club of Rome, and was deeply imporessed by its contents" he told abount the reason why he made such a proposal.

He stated that the reason for his proposal lay in the fact that "I was deeply impressed by 'The Limits to Growth; A Report for the Club of Rome's Project on the Predicament of Mankind', a research report by Club of Rome."
sen.cmt: Switched for flow, edited for flow
sen.e: He stated that the reason for his proposal lay in the fact that "I was deeply impressed by 'The Limits to Growth; A Report for the Club of Rome's Project on the Predicament of Mankind', a research report by Club of Rome."

sen.j: 国土交通省は学研都市の建設の理念を「産・官・学の連携の強化と、文化・学術・研究の国際的・学際的・業際的な交流の推進」としている。
sen.e: Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism define the concept of constructing the science city as "strengthening cooperation among industries, government offices and academic institutes and promoting international, interdisicpinary and inter-industrial exchange of culture, science and research.

Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism define construction of the science city as "strengthening cooperation among industries, government offices and academic institutes while promoting international, interdisicpinary and inter-industrial exchange of culture, science and research."

Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism define construction of the Science City as 'strengthening cooperation among industries, government offices and academic institutes while promoting international, interdisciplinary and inter-industrial exchange of culture, science and research.'
sen.cmt: " → ' としました。スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 学研都市には基礎研究などの中心となる地域として、文化学術研究地区（文化学術研究ゾーン）が設定されており、開発が進められている（文化学術研究地区以外の地域は周辺地区と呼ばれる）。
sen.e: In the science city, cultural and academic research zones are designated as the areas where facilities centered on basic research are to be constructed, and their development is underway (the areas other than the cultural and academic research zones are called periheral areas).

In the science city, cultural and academic research zones are designated as areas where facilities centered on basic research are to be constructed, and development is underway (areas other than the cultural and academic research zones are called periheral areas).

In the Science City, cultural and academic research zones are designated as areas where facilities centered on basic research are to be constructed, and development is underway (areas other than the cultural and academic research zones are called peripheral areas).
sen.cmt: Science City としました。スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 学研都市は、1994年に「都市びらき」が行われた。
sen.e: "The inauguration of the science city" was held in 1994.
"The inauguration of the science city" was held in 1994.
The inauguration of the science city' was held in 1994.

sen.j: 学研都市はバブル景気に建設がはじまったにもかかわらず、計画が中止にならずに建設が進められてきた。
sen.e: Although starting in the bubble boom era, the construction of the science city has been continued without the plan being cancelled.
Although construction of the science city started during the bubble, it has continued to this day without plans for cancellation.
Although construction of the Science City started during the bubble, it has continued to this day without plans for cancellation.

sen.j: しかし、2003年には木津地区での宅地開発計画が中止された。
sen.e: However, a housing land development plan in the Kizu area was cncelled.
However, a housing land development plan in the Kizu area was cancelled.
However, a housing land development plan in the Kizu area was cancelled in 2003.

sen.j: 学研都市で開発計画が中止に追い込まれたのは、これが初めてであった。
sen.e: This was the first case in which a development planned was cancelled.
This was the first case in which a development paln was cancelled.
This was the first case in which a development plan was cancelled.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: ほかにも、大手企業が研究所を閉鎖し撤退した地区や、施設の誘致が進まず空き地が目立つ地区、研究地区から住宅地区への変更・用途地域の変更を検討している地区もある。
sen.e: In addition, major companies closed their research laboratories in some areas, vacant lots are conspicuous in some other areas because the facilities to be located there cannot be found, and there are also the areas where it is considered to use the land for building houses instead of scientific facilities.

In addition, major companies closed their research laboratories in some areas. Vacant lots are conspicuous in other areas where facilities are no longer found. Some other areas are now being considered to be used as land for building houses instead of scientific facilities.

In addition, major companies closed their research laboratories in some areas; vacant lots are conspicuous in other areas where facilities are no longer found, and some other areas are now being considered to be used as land for building houses instead of scientific facilities.
sen.cmt: 一つの文章にしました。

sen.j: さらに、2002年には住友金属工業が、2004年にはバイエル薬品とキヤノンが学研都市から撤退した。
sen.e: In addition, Sumitomo Metal Industries, Ltd. withdraw its activities in the city in 2002, and Bayer AG and Canon followed suit in 2004.
In addition, Sumitomo Metal Industries, Ltd. withdrew its activities from the city in 2002, and Bayer AG and Canon followed suite in 2004.
In addition, Sumitomo Metal Industries, Ltd. withdrew its activities from the city in 2002, and Bayer AG and Canon followed suite in 2004.

sen.j: 計画が変更されている背景には不景気・需要の低迷などがあった。
sen.e: In the background of why the plan was modified, there were a recession and sluggisf demand.
Sluggish demand, and an ongoing rescession were named as the main culprits resulting in the modified plan.
Sluggish demand, and an ongoing recession were named as the main culprits resulting in the modified plan.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: さらに、企業が基礎研究から研究開発に重点を移しているなど、企業の研究に対する姿勢の変化が原因とも言われている。
sen.e: Furthermore, it is also said that private companies have shifted their attitudes for research from basic one to research and development.
Furthermore, it is also said that private companies shifted their focus from basic research to research and development.
Furthermore, it is also said that private companies shifted their focus from basic research to research and development.

sen.j: しかし、学研都市での研究が成果を上げていることも事実であり、今のところ、計画の大幅な変更は発表されていない。
sen.e: However, it is also ture that the research conducted in Science City has produced results, and no drastic modification of the original plan has been announced yet.
However, it is also undeniable that the research conducted in Science City has produced results, and no drastic modification of the original plan has been announced yet.
However, it is also undeniable that the research conducted in Science City has produced results, and no drastic modification of the original plan has been announced yet.

sen.j: その後2005年あたりから、景気回復や立地要件が緩和されたこと等により、企業の進出ペースが速まっており、2007年度中までに文化施設を含めた総立地施設数が100件を超えた。
sen.e: Because, since around 2005, business has been recovering and the conditions for the sites where facilities are to be built have been made less strict, increasingly many companies have advanced into the city, making the total number of the faicilities so far built, including cultural facilities, reach more than 100.

Since 2005, business has been recovering, with restrictions on the facility construction sites eased, resulting in an increasing number of companies advancing in to the city. The total number of facilities built so far, including cultural facilities number more than 100.

Since 2005, business has been recovering, with restrictions on the facility construction sites eased, resulting in an increasing number of companies advancing in to the city; the total number of facilities built so far, including cultural facilities numbered more than 100 during the fiscal year 2007.
sen.cmt: 一つの文章にしました。2007年度中 を追加しました。"fiscal 2007"→"fiscal year 2007"に変更しました。

sen.j: 当初は職住一体の街を計画していたが、実際には大阪市や京都市の都心に働きに行く人が多く、両市へのベッドタウンの傾向が強くなっている。
sen.e: It was initially planned that the people working in the city would also live there, but the actual tendency is that increasing more commuters to Osaka City or Kyoto City have lived there.
Initially, it was planned that people working in the city would also be able to live there, but in reality, commuters from Osaka City or Kyoto City are on the rise.

Initially, it was planned that people working in the city would also be able to live there, but in reality, commuters to Osaka City or Kyoto City are on the rise, resulting in a bedroom community for both cities.

sen.j: 2007年4月現在、総人口は約23万人（計画人口は41万人）、文化学術研究地区の人口は約8万人（計画人口は21万人）である。
sen.e: As of April of 2007, the population of the city is approx. 230,000 (compared with 410,000 that was planned), and that of the cultural and academic research zones is approx. 80,000 (compared with 210,000 that was planned).

As of April of 2007, the population of the city is approx. 230,000 (compared with 410,000 that was planned), and that of the cultural and academic research zones is approx. 80,000 (compared with 210,000 that was planned).

sen.j: 関西文化学術研究都市建設促進法
sen.e: The construction promotion law for Kansai Science City
The construction promotion law for Kansai Science City
The construction promotion law for Kansai Science City

sen.j: 1987年6月9日に公布・施行。
sen.e: Was proclaimed and enforced on June 9, 1987.
was proclaimed and enforced on June 9, 1987.

sen.j: 要点を以下に記した。
sen.e: The points of the law are as follws:
The points of the law are as follows:
The points of the law are as follows:

sen.j: 学研都市とは、大阪府枚方市、交野市、四條畷市、京都府京田辺市、精華町、木津町、奈良県生駒市、奈良市のうち、内閣総理大臣が定める地域を区域とする。
sen.e: Science City indicates the prime minister-designated areas in Hirakata City, Katano City and Shijonawate City of Osaka Prefecture, in Kyotanabe City, Seika-cho Town and Kizu City of Kyoto Prefecture and in Ikoma City and Nara City of Nara Prefecture.

Science City indicates the prime minister-designated areas in Hirakata City, Katano City and Shijonawate City of Osaka Prefecture, in Kyotanabe City, Seika-cho Town and Kizu City of Kyoto Prefecture and in Ikoma City and Nara City of Nara Prefecture.

Science City indicates the prime minister-designated areas in Hirakata City, Katano City and Shijonawate City of Osaka Prefecture, in Kyotanabe City, Seika-cho and Kizu-cho of Kyoto Prefecture and in Ikoma City and Nara City of Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 文化学術研究地区とは、文化学術研究施設・文化学術研究交流施設を整備し、公共施設・公益的施設・住宅施設などを整備すべき地区で、関係府県知事が作成した建設に関する計画によってその区域が定められる。
sen.e: A cultural and academic research zone indicates the area that is included in the construction plans compiled by the prefectural governors concenred and where public facilities, facilities for public benefits and housing facilities are to be constructed in addition to scientific research facilities and facilities for promoting exhange of scientifc researches.

A cultural and academic research zone indicates the area that is included in the construction plans compiled by the prefectural governors concerned and where public facilities, facilities for public benefits and housing facilities are to be constructed in addition to scientific research facilities and facilities for promoting exhange of scientifc researches.

A cultural and academic research zone indicates the area that is included in the construction plans compiled by the prefectural governors concerned and where public facilities, facilities for public benefits and housing facilities are to be constructed in addition to scientific research facilities and facilities for promoting exchange of scientific researches.

sen.j: 周辺地区とは、学研都市の文化学術研究地区の区域以外のことで、文化学術研究地区の整備に関連した施設を整備し、環境を保全すべき地区である。
sen.e: A periheral area indicates an area that is other than the cultural and academic research zones and where facilities related to the facilities constructed in the cultural and academic research zones are to be developed and the natural environments have to be preserved.

A peripheral area indicates an area that is other than the cultural and academic research zones and where facilities related to the facilities constructed in the cultural and academic research zones are to be developed and the natural environments are to be preserved.

A peripheral area indicates an area that is other than the cultural and academic research zones and where facilities related to the maintenance of the facilities constructed in the cultural and academic research zones are to be developed and the natural environments are to be preserved.
sen.cmt: 整備 を追加しました。

sen.j: 国土交通大臣は建設の基本方針を、関係府県知事は建設計画を決定・作成しなくてはならない。
sen.e: Minister of land, infrastructure and transportation must compile and decide the basic plan, and the prefectural governors concerned must compile and decide the construction plans.
Minister of land, infrastructure and transportation must compile and decide the basic plan, while the prefectural governors concerned must compile and decide the construction plans.
Minister of land, infrastructure and transportation must compile and decide the basic construction policy, while the prefectural governors concerned must compile and decide the construction plans.
sen.cmt: 基本方針 に変更しました。

sen.j: 国と地方公共団体は学研都市の整備、建設の資金の確保に努めなければならない。
sen.e: The nation and the local public bodies concerned must endeavour to raise funds necessary for constructing Science City.
The national and local public bodies concerned must endeavour to raise funds necessary for constructing Science City.
The national and local public bodies concerned must endeavor to raise funds necessary for constructing Science City.

sen.j: 国は税制上での優遇などの措置を行う。
sen.e: The nation must take a measure, for example, of giving favored tax treatment.
The nation must take measures favorable towards the place, for example, preferential tax treatment.
The government must take measures favorable towards the place, for example, preferential tax treatment.
